Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAdmin
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAdmin"
GetDevicesCountUsedToday SOAP Command

Get the mobile devices count on the server used today

Network edition only API TRUE
Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required true

GetDevicesCountUsedTodayRequest

    <GetDevicesCountUsedTodayRequest /> ## GetDevicesCountUsedTodayRequest

GetDevicesCountUsedTodayResponse

    <GetDevicesCountUsedTodayResponse count="{num-devices-used-today} (int)" /> ## GetDevicesCountUsedTodayResponse

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <GetDevicesCountUsedTodayResponse> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
@count Required (only 1) Type:int
Number of mobile devices on the server used today
